They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent

This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man believes he is an alien wrongfully arrested for obstruction. Claiming to be a law school student, a man just doesn’t understand why he was arrested for trespassing. A woman claims she swallowed her friend’s pills for good reason. A family reunion ends with a bruised and bloodied husband.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man attacks a medical officer and officers rush to intervene. After destroying a tree and unleashing pigeons, a woman is arrested. Unease is caused by a man’s menacing glare during his booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Over the course of a single shift, officers are forced to go toe to toe with a hotheaded inmate refusing to change cells without a fight and then must deal with the whims of a homeless man who demands room service and an upgraded jail cell.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A defiant suspect’s behavior takes a turn for the worse after being placed in the restraining chair. A spit mask wearing suspect attempts to procure enhancing supplements from a jail nurse. An intoxicated male suspect swoons for a certain female officer. A local vagrant is taken into custody after attempting to retrieve some things from his ex wife’s house.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A jail chaplain counsels a sad inmate. An intoxicated woman demands to talk to the Canadian Embassy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a truculent man is sent to the drunk-tank to sober up. In Portland, OR a drunk woman is jailed for attacking a child. In Sarasota, FL an intoxicated man has difficulty recalling why he's been arrested. In Spokane, WA a man "borrows" a car to curb his drug habit.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Acts of aggression cause a man to be placed in a restraint chair. Jail lockdown occurs after an inmate is stabbed with a pencil. After being booked for road rage a woman unleashes a venomous tirade.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An arrested man is caught on camera making a run for freedom. An addict returns to jail and tells officers that meth is controlling his mind. Humility may be the key for one man to quit his life of crime. A shoplifter calls 9-1-1 to help him get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man in detention is paranoid about officers handling him inappropriately. A man in custody claims to have a seizure. A man is taken in to custody for stealing videogaming equipment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E17 Gone to the Dogs
programme.desc: Officers find hidden drugs on a burglary suspect during a pat down that leads to a tense confrontation. A beer sets off a fight between a mom and her daughter causing one family member to end up in jail. A rare event takes place in the county jail - a woman arrested for a warrant is in a good mood. Punching a pit bull while drunk lands in man in jail where he comes face to face with a childhood hero.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT an inebriated man gets aggressive and questions why he's in custody. In Sarasota, FL a couple are taken in for assaulting a bartender. In Portland, OR a man is placed in custody for harassing movie theater security guards. In Las Vegas, NV a chauffeur is placed in custody for amassing a number of of moving violations.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man thinks the doctors are CIA agents. A homeless karate practitioner's actions land him in an isolated cell, and a Canadian man with no pants wants to arm wrestle.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two sisters go on a mini-crime spree, get caught and find no one will bail them out. A domestic argument about night fishing lands a husband in jail for breaking into his own car. An irate inmate blows off steam by doing laps in her jail cell. A woman finds out it’s hard to stop selling drugs when the neighborhood knows her business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An aspiring martial-arts fighter tries to wriggle out of handcuffs and gets stuck. A football rivalry takes a bad turn when a Steelers fan assaults a Ravens fan.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody. A dad gets busted for DUI while on his way to pick up a pizza for his kids. Officers recover drugs from a suspect’s pocket who is puzzled as to how they got there. A woman learns the hard way “what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Melee in the Cell
programme.desc: A brawl breaks out between inmates during a routine jail breakfast. An inmate alters their uniform in provocative and outlandish ways. Concerns abound as one-man issues violent threats at deputies.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man admits to urinating in public. A couple spends their date night in jail after being over served, and a DUI suspect passes out during booking.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: A K-9 unit finds the suspect hiding in a shed. A cooperative suspect is faced with a list of charges. A motorcycle chase comes to an end after the suspect ditches the stolen bike and flees on foot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer subdues a young man in mental duress. Officers stop a suspicious vehicle and find drug paraphernalia inside the woman's car. Officers respond to a robbery in progress.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E22 Four Legs Beats Two Legs
programme.desc: A suspect on a stolen motorcycle is apprehended with the assistance of the K-9 unit. An Officer responds to a domestic disturbance call after a woman "accidentally" stabs her boyfriend. A hazardous meth lab is busted.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man tosses his stash after being pulled over. Officers question two men in a fight who live with the same woman. A man says his shorts are from a thrift store after drugs are found in them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies search for a man who ran from a traffic stop. A man being pursued tells officers he was going to his mother’s house. A drunk driver won’t admit to hitting a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police conduct a sting operation. A woman is covered in white powder during a traffic stop. Officers spot a young boy on a bike who wandered away from home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E15 Abandonment of a Trailer
programme.desc: A dangerous high speed motorcycle chase ends in a wreck and a subsequent arrest. A Florida woman is pulled over in a routine traffic stop and is rewarded for her cooperation. A sheriff creates harmony between a quarreling couple at a mobile park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high-speed pursuit ends in a foot chase. Stolen property is found in a suspect’s car during a traffic stop. An altercation ends with a brick being tossed at a victim’s car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers attempt to detain undocumented people crosssing the border. Border patrol discovers a driver with a load of drugs in his car. Officers check passports and a suspicious-looking laptop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A feisty cyclist gives a team of officers a bloody fight. A scared caregiver attempts to evict an unwanted helper from her patient’s house. Mysterious tinfoil lands an unlicensed driver in hot water.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E32 I Always Pay My Debts
programme.desc: A man tries to bite an officer after narcotics are spotted in his mouth. Officers respond to a family fighting in their front yard. A suspect claims to be repaying a debt when he's caught buying drugs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police are in a high-speed chase with a car missing a tire. Police respond when a tow truck driver is assaulted by an apartment manager. Police are called when a relative attacks a woman’s husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police pursue a stolen motorcycle that turns into a foot chase. A domestic violence call results in the arrest of an abusive stepdad. Officers respond after a fight over cigarettes escalate.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A speedy suspect makes officers chase him through a creek. A teenage Good Samaritan gets in the middle of a bizarre domestic dispute. After a woman destroys her home, she begs police to arrest her.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A prostitute tries to outrun the police during a foot chase. A man claims he can only meet women at motels since he lives with his mom. A prostitute fresh out of jail protests that he’s not trying to return to his old career.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call reporting an officer-involved fight. A brazen driver careens into a ditch after failing to yield. A berserk woman is pulled over for her erratic driving.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver leads police on a slow speed chase towards Las Vegas. Three people are suspected of using contraband. A multi-neighbor dispute devolves into a fight involving guns and bats.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called when a disturbed naked man covered in blood is spotted in a park. Officers find a nude couple in a U-Haul truck. A traffic stop over a minor violation turns into a dangerous pursuit.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Hitching a ride home with the wrong guy almost lands one woman in the slammer. A known prostitute won’t be going on a second date. When a domestic partner refuses to leave home, officers intervene.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A vehicle is caught traveling in the opposite direction. A sting operation is designed to nab suspects who purchase narcotics. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local thrift store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspicious driver takes police on a neighborhood chase. Officers are called to capture a 12-foot python hiding outside a home. Officers suspect a funny walking motorist is hiding something in his shoe.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police respond to a report of prostitution in a hospital parking lot. A man and woman engaged in solicitation are pulled over. A woman loitering in an area known for prostitution tries to evade police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E26 Not a Momma's Boy
programme.desc: Officers are called to fight between a mother and her son. Officers respond to a man on a trolley hurling racial slurs at a passenger. A traffic stop uncovers narcotics in a young man’s trunk.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E34 Fast Pase Foot Chase
programme.desc: A high speed vehicular pursuit results in foot chase and subsequent arrest. Officers respond to a domestic call involving the residence’s girlfriend and her children who destroyed the man’s house. Police respond to a domestic violence call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E19 You Didn't Get Very Far
programme.desc: A husky cyclist takes a spill when he tries to flee. Officers chase a suspect in a stolen car who says he was just fixing it for a friend. A man's denials of drug use lose credibility when cops find a meth pipe in his vehicle

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are forced to use a taser to subdue a drunk driver. A man is arrested for soliciting prostitution. Officers respond to a complex domestic disturbance call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E12 The Car is Mine!
programme.desc: A man locks himself in a trunk after deputies respond to a restraining order call. Deputies respond to two women arguing over the ownership of a car. A driver comes clean to a deputy during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man can bail on child support payments, but can’t escape the police. One woman’s retaliation almost gets her girlfriend run over. A sluggish suspect denies the pile of marijuana in his car is his.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A cyclist gets booked for trying to split when officers pull him over for a traffic violation. Two brothers struggle to explain why they took off in their truck when they saw the cops. A man takes a swing at his sister because she refuses to mow the lawn.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Detectives chase a suspect who wrecks his car. Police are called when a man headbutts his neighbor. Officers tend to a woman punched in the face by her husband while on the bus.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officer ends up in a foot pursuit after pulling over a suspicious vehicle with expired tags. A recovering addict is caught with drug paraphernalia in her backpack. A man is served an arrest warrant for sexual battery.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E13 I Take This Criminal
programme.desc: During an arrest, a suspect decides to pop the question to his girlfriend. An abandoned house becomes the target of burglary. Two brothers’ dispute over a business matter leads to violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers investigate an apparent stabbing. Officers respond to a call about a suspicious man loitering in a private park. A driver insists his vehicle is not stolen even though the plates are.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E01 Ignorance is an Excuse
programme.desc: Two men engage in a fist fight on the street over an alleged robbery. A couple claims that they didn’t know the car they are driving is stolen. Occupants of a vehicle claim that all of the contraband found in their car is medical equipment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman claims a man abused her then put a curse on her. Police arrest a man for having illegal drugs on him. An elderly woman locks herself in the restroom at a bank.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E11 This Man Stabbed Me
programme.desc: A car thief leads police on a high-speed chase until officers pit his vehicle to end the pursuit. Cops cool off a baby and search for the man who left him in a car. Potty-mouthed witnesses inform officers that their friend has been stabbed in the chest.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called when two intoxicated suspects decide to have some fun and vandalize a fence. Undercover officers set up a narcotics sting at a hotel. A man is found lying naked in a parking lot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man on parole dumps a stolen car and flees from officers on foot. A man denies stealing a wallet from a car with a smashed window. A hostile woman gives officers a false name.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Cops are forced to take desperate measures when an unruly suspect won’t stop fighting. Officers have to contain a man looking to flee with crack. Police know a tearful driver has weed in the car when he refuses to open his glove box.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A homeowner shoots at intruders only he can see. The driver of a stolen truck claims he’s just trying to return the vehicle to a friend. A argument about parenting styles turns ugly when a gun is pulled.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies question a woman they believe to be a prostitute working the Las Vegas Strip. A woman tries to pin ownership of drug paraphernalia on an absent friend. A man consents to let officers in his backyard, but he confesses to his own trespasses first.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E04 There Goes that Alligator
programme.desc: Police arrest a suspect for armed robbery. A six foot alligator is found on a homeowner's back porch. An Officer assists in an undercover sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers search for suspects stealing rims at a car dealership. A married couple claim drugs found in their car were from a nearby ditch. Officers detain an inebriated man arguing with a store clerk.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E10 Get Off My Roof
programme.desc: The K-9 unit responds when a gunman takes to the rooftops. A drug exchange goes awry when the dealer tries to ditch his stash. A pickup-driving drunk tries to play it off when he smashes his neighbor's parked car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover Officers organize a buy-bust sting. Racoons hide out in a woman's chimney. A man gets pulled over for soliciting a prostitute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E03 Gas up and Run!
programme.desc: A man is tasered twice after struggling with two deputies. A gas station fight ends in a foot chase. A deputy pulls over a pair of quarreling lovers after they run a stop sign.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A chase ends when a driver-less vehicle goes headfirst into an apartment complex. A swift suspect can’t scamper fast enough to evade police. On routine patrol, officers stumble upon a 7-year-old boy who left home alone.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer struggles with a man reaching for something in his pocket. A man won’t cop to the gun in his backseat. Police arrive on the scene when a man threatens to shoot his wife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E03 Red Cycle, Red Cycle
programme.desc: A search of a suspicious pedestrian turns into a foot chase. A suspect riding a red motorcycle refuses to surrender to police. A driver’s poor response time attracts attention.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E12 You’ll Shoot Your Eye Out
programme.desc: A suspect runs through a hotel fence and then gives an employee some shocking news. Officers come upon two brothers who have just been in a knife fight. Cops arrive after an unruly man fires his BB gun at a neighbor’s child.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E15 All The World's Our Bedroom
programme.desc: Officers are called to remove a man sleeping in a parking spot at Wal-Mart. A free-spirited couple takes their relationship to their front lawn. A resident brings a knife to a meeting with his building property manager.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A resistant suspect thinks he sees monsters everywhere. Cops are forced to officiate a spousal wrestling match. Officers try to sort out where two motorists got their car and whose dope they possess.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman stuffs drugs into her under garments. A mother attacks her daughter because she got married in Vegas. Officers are called when a woman is accused of stalking her friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E14 She Needed a Nap
programme.desc: Deputies pursue a man involved in a carjacking. Deputies are called to an altercation between a father and son. Officers respond to an unresponsive woman lying in a roadway.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two juveniles involved in a carjacking. Two men sitting in a truck are spotted hiding something in the console. A man claims he took drug paraphernalia from kids as a good samaritan.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E05 Dyed in the Wool
programme.desc: A suspect selling narcotics takes off on foot. A bank robber leaves his wallet in an abandoned money bag. Multiple domestic violence calls end in arrests

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call which escalates to car chase and the eventual arrest of two suspects. Officers spot a known drug dealer who uses a troubling method to conceal his narcotics. An officer curbs a heckler outside a popular bar.

programme.desc: Seafood loving chef Spencer Watts gets casual and formal with monkfish and clam recipes that feature some of his favorite libations - beer and wine.

programme.title: Fish the Dish

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Full of luxurious treats, the northern Italian region of Lombardy offers rich and delicious cuisine. For his antipasto, celebrity chef Michael Bonacini prepares a delicate dish of Stuffed Squash Blossoms. Soft and light, these blossoms are enhanced with a creamy filling of parmesan, anchovies, and nutmeg. Following the fresh taste of flowers, Michael cooks up an impressive and rich Risotto Milanese. A feast for your eyes and taste buds, this risotto is coloured by saffron and its floral strands release flavour and colour as it's cooked. For his secondo Michael pairs a succulent Veal Roast with the sweet and sour Mustard Fruit to bring out a tangy delight. Michael's dolce looks solely at...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Known for its lush landscape, Umbria is a region of that offers fresh, seasonal ingredients perfect for simple yet boldly flavoured cuisine. To begin his Umbrian feast, Chef Michael Bonacini serves up a sweet and spicy antipasto of Fried Spicy Tomato Flatbread. Seasoned with chili peppers for that bit of heat, Michael's antipasto is a humble yet satisfying snack. For his primo, Michael brings our attention to an Umbrian specialty: truffles! Prepared with light and fluffy pasta, Michael's Gnocchi with Black Truffle concentrates the decadent flavour of the truffle in the pillowy pasta to create a rich and delectable dish. Paying homage to the plights of farmers and fisherman, Michael's...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini explores sweet and spicy dishes hailing from the coastal region of Calabria. For his antipasto, Michael cooks up a light and refreshing Brioche with Gelato. Fluffy brioche buns surround the sweet flavours of gelato for a delicious start to your meal. Switching to spice for the primo, Michael introduces a Spicy Sausage and Ricotta Pasta. Full of sweet, savoury, and spicy flavours, this dish provides a strong, flavourful meal sure to please any crowd. For his secondo, Michael goes for a hearty Lamb au Gratin with Peas and Asparagus; a classic holiday dish that will warm any room. For his finale, Michael whips up a simple, yet impressive, Chocolate-covered Figs.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Puglia's lush landscape and large coastline characterize its cuisine. Chef Michael Bonacini explores its native ingredients through some of Puglia's favourite meals. First up, Michael's antipasto is a guaranteed crunchy bite with crispy Fried Mussels. Stepping away from the sea, Michael highlights Puglia's prize crop: tomatoes! Combining colourful tomatoes with flavourful burrata cheese, Michael cooks up comfort in a bowl with his Tomato and Burrata Risotto. Taking on a more festive flair, Michael introduces us to Little Pork Bombs, the hottest street food in Puglia. With a filling of fresh herbs and melted cheese, these pork skewers are savoury and irresistible. Then, Michael introduces...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Simplicity is key with Sicilian cuisine and Chef Michael Bonacini explores just how the region balances simplicity with intensity through four flavourful dishes. Starting with an antipasto of Folded Flatbread with Ricotta and Fennel Seeds, Michael inspires with its intricate beauty with a simple recipe. Keeping to the theme of simplicity, Michael shows that plenty of flavour can come from little ingredients in his primo of Broccoli and Sausage Rigatoni. The spicy sausage and chili is countered by a creamy broccoli pesto for a dish that highlights Sicilian cuisine. Michael turns to the Italian queen of crops for his secondo: Eggplant Parmesan Roll-Ups. With thin slices of eggplant rolled...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Filled with ruins in its bustling streets, the region of Lazio sticks with grandeur in all it does, including food! To introduce us to Lazio, Host Michael Bonacini highlights its Jewish influence with a crispy Roman Jewish-style Artichokes. As crunchy as a potato chip, Michael's artichokes are a delicious fried treat that are a perfect way to kick off a delicious meal. For his primo Michael brings together simple ingredients to create a rich Bucatini with Amatriciana Sauce. Michael's secondo turns what was once peasant food into a delectable and tender dish. Cooked with a blend of vegetables and sauce, Michael's Braised Oxtail brings forth the history of cuisine. Returning to Rome for his...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Campania's beautiful coastline is filled with two things: tourists and seafood. Diving into the culture of the region, Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini begins his meal with a salad from the Island of Capri. Putting a twist on the classic dish, Michael's Grilled Caprese Salad combines fresh tomatoes, tangy balsamic, and a hint of sweetness from basil. For his primo, Michael serves up bold flavours with his Spaghetti Puttanesca. Mixing salty and sweet, this sauce offers a delicious take on the typical plate of spaghetti. Looking to the coast for his secondo, Michael quickly cooks up aromatic and spicy Herb-stuffed Scallops and Grilled Broccoli Rabe. For his dolce Michael whips up a dessert...

programme.desc: Pork and the grill are good buddies and host Spencer Watts shows us four of his favourite pork recipes that will have you salivating.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser that's easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Have a cheese lover coming over? Blow their minds with some of Spencer's "grate" barbecued cheese recipes! First up, Spencer chars Brie Cheese to an ooey-gooey perfection and tops it with tart cherries and crunchy walnuts, serving it with crispy grilled crostinis. Next up is a Grilled Steak and Caesar with a twist only Spencer could add - grilled... lettuce! Then, Spencer uses the classic German "hasselback" presentation to stuff chicken breasts with verdant spinach, yummy Swiss cheese and pungent sun- dried tomatoes, grilling them to melty perfection. Finally, Spencer fires up his barbecue to make his Grilled Peaches with Salted Bourbon Caramel, a decadent dessert elevated with creamy...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: In this bacon loving episode, Chef Spencer delivers a tasty Bacon Weave Turkey Breast, which gets injected with beer and spices before being wrapped up in its cozy bacon blanket and sent off to the grill! Next up? A Peameal Bacon Roast with Rosti. This heavy hunk of back bacon gets smoked to flavourful perfection while Chef Watts makes the crispiest golden-fried-to-perfection potato pancake. Then, Spencer whips up a charry, grilled, super decadent, bacon-wrapped and bacon stuffed cheeseburger. Spencer isn't finished with bacon yet! For his final recipe, Spencer stuffs an apple with decadent crispy morsels stuffed along with savoury caramelized onions and melty cheddar cheese.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: This episode kicks off with Spencer's tasty Grilled Caesar Salad. He skillfully piles of char-grilled romaine lettuce wedges and sourdough croutons are topped with tangy dressing, crispy pancetta, and shards of a homemade parmesan tuile. For his next recipe, Spencer whips up Grilled Zucchini Boats that filled with fresh ingredients including orzo pasta, summer veggies, and herbs. Chef Watts loves a good steak and his Grilled Cauliflower Steak is not one to be passed up! Dusted in Middle Eastern Spices, flame roasted and served with chili-spiked, Yemeni 'Skhug' hot sauce and pomegranate seeds. Finally, Spencer steams tender artichokes, stuffing these flowers with breadcrumbs and...

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Welcome to BBQing 101. The team gives the school term a kick start for some rowdy university students. Smoked Pulled Pork with Tangy BBQ Sauce, Spiced up Beer Can Chicken and Chili Yam Fries give these scholars a taste of simple, healthy BBQed food.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the team do some extreme grilling for the skateboarders at a local park. The crowd flips for Black Bean Mussels, Prosciutto Wrapped Chicken Breasts Stuffed with Goat Cheese, Smoked Tomato Bruschetta and Smoked Banana Sticks with Rum Butter Glaze.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and his team visit the tennis club and serve up some grilled eats for the club members. Smoked Salmon, Beef Tenderloin with Cherry Sauce, Asparagus with Citrus Butter with a Grand Slam Beet Salad are the perfect match after a long day on the courts

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team prepare BBQ Sunday Dinner with ingredients from the Farmers Market. Herbed Prime Rib, Grilled Pork Chops with Garlic and Herbs, Roasted Root Veggies with Mustard Glaze, and Yorkshire pudding will please friends and family alike!

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Using internationally inspired recipes, Matt and the Road Grill team take us on a taste bud tour around the world with Stuffed Peppers, Bison Burgers with Oka Cheese, Tandoori Lamb Ribs and Tea Smoked Hoisin Duck.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Coed Charity Baseball Tournament
programme.desc: Matt and the Team cook up a mound of food for hungry athletes raising money for charity. No one went hungry with Beef Dip Sandwiches; Lemon Honey Garlic Baby Back Pork Ribs; and fresh Grilled Mahi-mahi with sweet Pineapple Tomatillo Salsa.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is having a Costume Party he's bravely entrusted his buddy Jim to pick out their outfits. With a menu of slow smoked Thai ribs, cinnamon chicken and snapper in parchment paper, Rob's skill at the grill is unmasked

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's time for Rob's long awaited pool party. His friends sun by the pool, while Rob makes a splash at the grill with turkey burgers, slow smoked beef ribs, roasted tomato salad and grilled chicken with spicy pine nut crust.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Hold your Horse"...shoes! Rob hosts his annual Horseshoe BBQ tournament, and grills up a southern feast. He and his ring of friends devour delicious smoked rotisserie pig, lemon ginger chicken drumsticks and roasted peppers stuffed with corn.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is born to be wild - Hog Wild that is! Rob and his motorcycle riding friends cruise the streets for charity then head back to Rob's for the post parade party. The hungry bikers don't rebel when he serves up a picnic pork roast, funky potato packages, tamarind shrimp, plus sauces and sides galore.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: On your mark, get set, grill! Rob hosts an Olympic celebration and serves up a gold medal meal of stuffed veal chops, smoked leg of lamb, grilled pesto peppers and a cool summer salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and his friends catch a wave of good times and good food at his Surf & Turf BBQ. They feast of crab legs, roasted leg of lamb, a bucket of clams and the biggest thickest steak you ever did see!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Grilling expert Spencer Watts hosts a tasty beef-a-palooza with four incredible beef cuts including smoked brisket and succulent beef tenderloin.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Grilled, Roasted & Charred Chicken
programme.desc: Charismatic host Spencer Watts shows us why chicken is best on the grill with four irresistible chicken recipes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill

programme.title: Watts On the Grill

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team to cook up a midsummer feast. Leg of Lamb with Summer Herbs, Rosemary Grilled Pork Tenderloin with Wild Berry Sauce, Grilled Trout with Peaches, and a Tomato Salad have the locals raiding the market to stay stocked on the season's best.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team spend the day playing around the Water Park. The Spit Roasted Lemon-Lime Butter Chicken, Grilled Swordfish Skewers with Caribbean Salsa, and Smokey Spareribs with BBQ Sauce result in a big splash with this pool loving crowd.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill team grill up a feast for some hungry athletes at the Ultimate Frisbee Tournament. Jumbo shrimp with a rosemary dry rub, Slo-smoked Pork Butt in a Papaya Marinade, and Asian Pasta Salad have the athletes asking for more.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Antique Steam train is in town! Matt and the team give the crowd something to chew-chew on with delicious Grilled Vegetable Quesadillas, Honey Mustard Chicken Drumsticks, Grilled Turkey Burgers with Pineapple Salsa, and Grilled Corn with Orange Butter

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Road Grill team follows him to the baseball diamond and together they treat the ball players to two kinds of mini burgers, some triple play stuffed veal, Mushroom Fricassee on a baguette, and Homerun Mixed Smoked Nuts.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill team lend a hand at a Habitat for Humanity building site to feed hungry volunteers. Matt and the team make some delicious Brick Chicken, some Maple Wood Planked Pork, Steak Sandwiches, and Blue Cheese and Bacon Potato Salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Going once, going twice, gone. Rob and his friends are donating their special keepsakes to a Silent Auction to raise money for charity. They head over to Robs for a quick and delicious pre-auction chowdown that includes lemon pepper Cornish Hens, sweet monkfish, chili lime shrimp and stuffed pork tenderloin.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob likes to Rock and Roll all night and BBQ every Saturday. This time he rocks out with his buddy Jim's Band "Giver". While they belt out the tunes, Rob creates his own hits with grilled lamb chops, crispy potato skins, beef brisket and smoked Proscuitto wrapped shrimp.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Ole! Rob serves up a Spanish Tapas BBQ that includes spicy lamb ribs, beef tenderloin, blackened scallops, proscuitto wrapped figs stuffed with blue cheese and gazpacho vodka in cucumber cups. The portions are small, but the taste is huge! And that's no bull.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob likes clowning around, but he is the Ringmaster of his own Carnival Day BBQ. After a fun day at the fair, Rob keeps the party going with a fairground finger food like pizza burgers, homemade pogos, pork ribs and cool iced tea.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and his friends are hitting the bike trails. After a long bike ride, Rob grills up a high protein meal of veal ribs, steelhead trout, southwestern black bean salad and pistachio and honey crusted lamb racks.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: The liquor cabinet is getting too full so Rob is throwing a Boozy BBQ with the left over spirits from parties past. He pulls together a feast of tequila chicken breasts, white wine veal chops, martini and grilled tarragon mushrooms.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Pork was Made for Barbeques
programme.desc: Pork and the grill are good buddies and host Spencer Watts shows us four of his favourite pork recipes that will have you salivating.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser that's easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Have a cheese lover coming over? Blow their minds with some of Spencer's "grate" barbecued cheese recipes! First up, Spencer chars Brie Cheese to an ooey-gooey perfection and tops it with tart cherries and crunchy walnuts, serving it with crispy grilled crostinis. Next up is a Grilled Steak and Caesar with a twist only Spencer could add - grilled... lettuce! Then, Spencer uses the classic German "hasselback" presentation to stuff chicken breasts with verdant spinach, yummy Swiss cheese and pungent sun- dried tomatoes, grilling them to melty perfection. Finally, Spencer fires up his barbecue to make his Grilled Peaches with Salted Bourbon Caramel, a decadent dessert elevated with creamy...

programme.title: A Day in Paradise
programme.desc: Filmed in 2013 by David Huting, the tiny island is hidden off of the northeastern coast of the outer Fiji Islands (near Taveuni), and boasts a perfect white sandy beach, groves of palm trees, and a majestic lagoon that shelters the island from all sides. It has more turtle visitors than humans!

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: Great World Hotels

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Food Fact Fun Niagara, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts in Niagara with a 5 course meal along with enjoying dance performances near the Niagara falls. Next, exploring the urban space, he visits the Skylon town for a stunning view of the city. Further he visits the Niagara-on-the-lake village and explores its surroundings. He then interacts with a wine expert to learn more about the regional wines. Lastly, Alex is seen exploring the Niagara falls by helicopter, the a tunnel that takes him to the observation desk and then by ferry.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Kissed By The Sea Mauritius 1
programme.desc: Blessed with coral reefs, sapphire waters and powder-white beaches, Mauritius is the kind of place that rewards even the smallest attempts at exploration. Renowned adventurer, Sakshi Pradhan finds herself in an old lighthouse on Fouquet Island and then stumbles upon the Junk Café. From snorkeling in sapphire waters to taking a walk with lions in Casela National Park, she comes across various adventures in Mauritius, which make her feel alive.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico S2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Viajar Mexico S2 Monterrey
programme.desc: In Monterrey, one of Mexico’s ‘Pueblo Magicos’, Charlie heads straight to a canyon, where the locals go to have ‘beer and barbecue’ picnics.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 World Heritage Monuments of Cairo and Luxor, Egypt
programme.desc: While the Pyramids of Giza, built as a royal mortuary, reveal the religious beliefs of Egyptian pharaohs, temples, like the Luxor temple, offer a glimpse of ancient Egyptian mythology. The Saladin Citadel, which defines the skyline of Cairo, however, tells stories of the faith of Ottoman rulers. The monuments of Egypt are a testament to the different beliefs that have shaped this country.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: This exhilarating city of castles, beer and segway rides can take you on a break that will truly leave you catching your breath.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun

Then he visits the Richmond Night Market and then Treasure Cafe. Later visits the Steel Toad Brewery in Olympic Village. Next he explores the Gastown, including the steam clock. Further he explores the Hills Native Art ending with Vancouver observation deck. Next he rides on board the Grouse Mountain Skyride, ending with Capilano Suspension Bridge park.

With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels

programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: BMW is one of the most successful automotive companies in the world. From the beginning, racing is one of the pillars for this success.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The golden years of racing for Porsche.

programme.title: The Yas Marina Story
programme.desc: The Yas Marina Circuit in Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Team X-Raid at the Dakar Rally
programme.desc: Stéphane Peterhansel is the most successful driver in the history of the Dakar Rally; with the German team X-Raid, he won the 2012 and 2013 editions of this prestigious competition in a Mini Countryman.

programme.title: Special - Pikes Peak
programme.desc: For almost a century man and machine have tried to tame the mountain that is Pikes Peak. Daredevils have risked everything to try and be fastest up the 20-kilometer road that summits the rocky mountain at 4300 meters above sea level.

programme.title: Ice Action Finland
programme.desc: Former World Rally Champion Armin Schwarz is a legend behind the wheels. Now he instructs others in driving a 300 hp Subaru WRX STI rally car on the snowy and icy landscape of Finland.

programme.title: Isle of Man TT 2015 Documentary
programme.desc: TT Sidecar champion Klaus Klaffenböck and racing expert Lenz Leberkern explore the fascination behind the Tourist Trophy on the British Isle of Man.

programme.title: Seacon UK Rally Show by Special Stage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E101 Seacon UK Rally Show by Special Stage
programme.desc: Experience the thrill of U.K.'s winter rallies, with icy roads, skilled drivers and the landscapes.

programme.title: Seacon UK Rally Show by Special Stage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E102 Seacon UK Rally Show by Special Stage
programme.desc: There are rallies from all parts of the kingdom, starting with the Malcolm Wilson Rally.

programme.title: Seacon UK Rally Show by Special Stage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E103 Seacon UK Rally Show by Special Stage
programme.desc: The crew kicks things off in Wales with the Severn Valley Stages.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: From Magdeburg, Germany.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Everything that has wheels takes part to see who is the fastest over the 402 meter concrete track in Eisenach, Thuringen Germany.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: BMW Tuner Manhart Racing celebrates at the Nurburgring Track.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: You want to feel like a race driver? The British car manufacture Radical can make your dreams come true.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Audi RS6 is the benchmark when it comes to extreme estate cars.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Featuring the Subaru BRZ, the Alfa 4C and the Porsche Cayman GT.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: It is one of the most spectacular automotive campaigns of the last 10 years: 'The Beast of the Green Hell'. Stars of the video are four-time Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: For Porsche fans, it's the ultimate fusion of road suitability and race track compatibility: The Porsche 911 GT3. With its 475 hp engine and a maximum torque of 440 Newton-meters, it accelerates from zero to 100 km/h in 3.5 seconds.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: What has been known in motorsports for ages is now used for road vehicles as well: lightweight construction. In many cases the magic word is carbon.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Selling more than a million cars per year, Audi is now one of the most successful car manufacturers in the world. The brand with the four rings stands for innovation, superior technology and outstanding design.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of auto unions.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: At a time when horses and carriages characterized traffic, visionaries like Henry Ford were working on the mobility of tomorrow. His ideas and approaches have a major share of the individual mobilization in the world.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Remember the first Beetle? When did Ferdinand Porsche design this people's car? Follow the evolution of the automobile over the last century.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The 24 Hours of Le Mans are the toughest race in the world. In 1951 Porsche took part in the 24 hour-classic for the very first time and competed every year ever since. Till 1998 the Porsche enjoyed 16 victories with its prototypes.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: A BMW M5, in touring version.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Discovering Mechatronik, a company dedicated to the restoration and refinement of classic Mercedes-Benz. Also, a look at the Nissan 370 Z, Porsche Cayman, Chevrolet Camaro and Mercedes-AMG ML 63.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The GT MF 5 is a power pack.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The who's who of automotive tuning congregate at the 82nd International Motor Show in Geneva, where around 180 European and global premiers will be shown.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The tuning forge MTM is known for their extremely dynamic, optimally tuned vehicles. Also, a look at the Nissan Juke-R, a projectile with 485 horsepower and the dimensions of a cigar box.

programme.title: Top Ten Show
programme.desc: What's hot and what's not in the glamorous world of cars. This time we've decided to focus on the fastest cars.

programme.title: Top Ten Show

programme.title: Tankwa Trek - MTB Stage Race - Koue Bokkeveld (RSA)
programme.desc: The Tankwa Trek is one of the most important stage races in the Union Cycliste Internationale global calendar. With four days of beautifully challenging and extremely rewarding riding, it attracts local and international stars.

programme.title: Mystic Sk8 Cup - Skateboard Festival - Prague (CZE)
programme.desc: It is the 25th edition of the legendary Mystic Sk8 Cup. We are on the Prague island of Štvanice and a three-day skate festival awaits. We look forward to street and bowl competitions with prize money of CZK 800,000 and skateboarders from more than 22 countries.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs - Sibiu (ROM)
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Hard Enduro Rally was launched in 2004 and has become the toughest hard enduro rally in the world, attracting participants from around 50 countries every year. The race promises five days of pure hard enduro racing action

programme.title: Nendaz Freeride FWT Challenger - Live delayed Part 3
programme.desc: The third FWT Challenger delivered an unforgettable day full of action on the legendary Mont Gond wall. Perfect conditions for the 63 riders from all over Europe, the USA, New Zealand and Japan.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
